Text: It seems i cannot update, i get a message saying "There has been an error. Error reading file C.Program Files(86)/Valley2/runtimedata/updates/updatelist.txt The application will exit now." , anything i missed?
Ignore my post, Something must have happend during the install, reinstalled it and it works.
I also got that error when I launched the updater manually, but it worked when I used the Found Updates button at the main menu.

So is the Keygen working okay for you guys?

All it does for me is quickly flash up a MSDOS program which shuts itself.

So I wanted to make sure it was working for you all and it's just me?

It works on Windows XP/Vista/7 and I see no reason for it not to work on Windows 8 as well. 

What OS are you using?

Vista - but that's okay I just wanted to make sure it worked for others.  I've seen various versions of this file at different sizes so I didn't know if it got cut off or something.

If it normally works for other people than it probably really is just me - my PC is doing funky things recently.

I'll run the file on another PC here and write the code down from that one, but thanks :D
